meanings.definition: Not strengthened or supported by additional materials or structures.
meanings.sent1: The unreinforced wall showed cracks due to lack of support.
meanings.sent2: The bridge collapsed because it was unreinforced and weak.
meanings.sent3: The unreinforced chair wobbled dangerously when sat on.
meanings.sent4: Her unreinforced confidence crumbled under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The unreinforced rope snapped under the weight of the load.

meanings.definition: Not made stronger or more secure by adding extra support or protection.
meanings.sent1: The unreinforced door easily broke when pushed.
meanings.sent2: The unreinforced glass shattered upon impact.
meanings.sent3: The unreinforced umbrella flipped inside out in the wind.
meanings.sent4: His unreinforced argument fell apart under scrutiny.
meanings.sent5: The unreinforced relationship couldn't withstand the challenges.
